Author: songfireleaf
Text: Helping him prepare the meals sounds good in theory, I may do that if, once it's food time, I figure it's not gonna make my brain freak out. And I am way too broke to feast on quest bars haha, I'll prolly figure something else out though. Thank you a lot, hopefully it'll help. I really appreciate this.

Author: greycat91
Text: It sounds like you have a really wonderful and understanding boyfriend. If it isn’t a trigger for you, maybe you could help him prepare the meals? That way you can spend time together and be involved in thanksgiving in a way that doesn’t involve eating the food. Then on the side, you can prepare your safe foods and whenever he eats his food, you can eat yours. You could also just like feast on quest bars lol
